author: Steve Townsend
comment: Would not work on my smart wear watch could not get it to do anything, waste of time!

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: Please review the trouble shooting, or email me for help resolving.

author: Brian Attard Montalto
comment: Mediocre. Worst part is the ambient mode... it doesn't look nice there. Removed it as soon ad I saw that

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: You can customize the ambient mode with Premium version.

author: Joe Hunt
comment: Watch looks really nice on this watch. It just might become my daily watchface. I just installed it time will tell (pun intended). 1 drawback that i found is that new changes to the watchface dont happen quickly. I made changes to it 5 mins ago stil havent been applied to the watch. Not a reason for me to take a star away. For now.

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: Thanks so much! The changes should take effect as soon as you press the sync to watch button. If this is not happening, please send me a email so I can try to help.

title: Moto 360 2nd gen

author: Peter Hahn
comment: Nice, high quality watch face, would give it 5 stars if with option to spin turbine.
title: Nice

author: Don Zurenko
comment: Get it its cool clean and looks great
title: I like it

author: David Taroyan
comment: Quality watch faces by this developer...  Had a question about something and he updated really quick.  Great job
title: Great watch face!
